pkgmetadata.longdescription: PyEPR provides Python_ bindings for the ENVISAT_ Product Reader C API(`EPR API`_) for reading satellite data from ENVISAT_ESA_ (European Space Agency) mission.PyEPR, as well as the `EPR API`_ for C, supports ENVISAT_ MERIS, AATSRLevel 1B and Level 2 and also ASAR data products. It provides access tothe data either on a geophysical (decoded, ready-to-use pixel samples)or on a raw data layer. The raw data access makes it possible to readany data field contained in a product file... _Python: https://www.python.org.. _`EPR API`: https://github.com/bcdev/epr-api.. _ENVISAT: https://envisat.esa.int.. _ESA: https://earth.esa.int
